Certainly! The video you provided is a clip from the TV show "Friends" featuring characters Ross Geller (David Schwimmer) and Chandler Bing (Matthew Perry). In this scene, Ross is trying to convince his friends that he's not crazy after they find him talking to himself in an empty room.
Ross: [to himself] Oh no, I think she might be on to us... Hi there? *looks around* Is anyone here? Hello? No one? Just me then? Okay goodbye.
Chandler: What are you doing man? Talking to yourself again?
Joey: Yeah dude, what's going on with ya? You gotta get some help for real.
Monica: He's just lonely okay guys, don't worry about it. It happens when we travel alone sometimes too. We talk out loud because nobody else can hear ourselves right? Like if someone was sitting next to us at dinner or something yeah? So maybe try striking up conversation like normal people do instead of yelling into thin air all day long huh buddy boy? Maybe go grab coffee sometime soon so your ears aren’t always ringin'.”
